snippet: The car rental company said it would restate or correct financial results for the last three years to fix accounting errors originating in 2011.
abstract: Hertz Global says it will restate or correct financial results for last three years to fix accounting errors originating in 2011; announcement sends shares down as much as 12 percent.
lead_paragraph: The car rental company said it would restate or correct financial results for the last three years to fix accounting errors originating in 2011.
